      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected java.util.HashSet<Span> AbstractAlgorithm.getCombinedData()
      Return all spans in a single HashSet (useful for the preprocess method) The distinction between training/test/etc set is lost, so be careful to not use this in the train() method
      protected java.util.HashSet<Span> AbstractAlgorithm.getCombinedTrainingData()
      Get all training data from (maybe) different subsets into one set.
      protected java.util.HashSet<Span> AbstractAlgorithm.getTestData()
      Get the data subset that corresponds to the test set
      protected java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashSet<Span>> AbstractAlgorithm.getTrainingData()
      Get all training data, which is all subsets (also for validation etc.) except the test data subset
